personalInfo.name: Niranjan A S
personalInfo.summary: Skilled in both front-end and back-end development technologies, creating dynamic and responsive applications that are both visually appealing and highly functional.

contributions: Proven ability to brainstorm ideas for the features required for UI Implementation. Active involvement in ideation sessions. Creative ideation for UI features. Contributed to design discussions.
Demonstrated proficiency in prototyping functional UI components using vanilla JS, later converted to a React web application. Expertise in prototyping. Seamless integration into React application.
Significant contribution to a College Website Project. Key role in project development. Collaborative efforts for enhanced functionality.

Collaborated with the Product Development team to prototype the client-side Kanban Board project. The prototype was sent for further development, contributing to the ongoing upgrades of the company's product.
Designed and implemented the complete screens for the AgilePoint Server Configuration tool from scratch. The final product is set to be released as a Single Page Application.
Worked closely with the AgilePoint Portal Settings Team to enhance features for seamless deployment.

Currently engaged with the AgilePoint Portal VNxt Backend Team, serving as a vital gateway for the company's product. Responsibilities include managing user authentication, module registration, access rights, and more.

cryptox.description: A command line application built in Node.js that provides users with the ability to check the price of various cryptocurrencies in their desired currency format. It supports functionalities such as adding, removing, and displaying API keys, as well as specifying the cryptocurrency and currency for conversion.

chatgpt-cli.description: A command line application that allows users to access the OpenAI's ChatGPT API and generate text based on their input.

slate.description: A complete note-taking app with markdown support and search filters utilizing the browser's local storage as DB

netflixClone.description: A clone of the popular Netflix web app with custom search functionality and pagination.
